neighbors.name: Jose Luis Lopez
neighbors.claims: Jose Luis Lopez is recorded as the owner of Maricopa County parcel 400-35-005[Maricopa County Assessor](https://maps.mcassessor.maricopa.gov/help/t_search.html). Public records indicate a Jose Luis Lopez in Buckeye has registered business entities such as 'Solar Formula LLC' and 'Tint Klub LLC' at a different address (7477 S Sunrise Way), though it is unconfirmed if this is the same individual as the subject parcel owner[Arizona Corporation Commission](https://brokersnapshot.com/Company?dot=3067966&prefix=MC&docket=59226). No specific stance on development or public speaking record was found for this property owner.
neighbors.influence_justification: No confirmed civic roles; potential local business owner

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach with a personal visit to learn his concerns and explain project benefits in a one-on-one conversation.

citations.title: Maricopa County Assessor - Parcel Search Help

citations.claim: Public records indicate a Jose Luis Lopez in Buckeye has registered business entities such as 'Solar Formula LLC' and 'Tint Klub LLC' at a different address
citations.title: Broker Snapshot - Jose Luis Lopez / Solar Formula LLC

neighbors.verification_notes: A 'Jose Luis Lopez' in Buckeye is associated with 'Solar Formula LLC' (APN 504-40-191). Due to the commonality of the name and different APNs, we cannot definitively link the business owner to Parcel 400-35-005. Stance remains unknown.

neighbors.name: Christian J. Munoz
neighbors.claims: Christian J. Munoz is the recorded owner of Maricopa County parcel 400-35-436[Maricopa County Assessor](https://maps.mcassessor.maricopa.gov/help/t_search.html). His name appears in creditor matrices for bankruptcy proceedings, suggesting standard consumer activity, but no public remarks on development or civic leadership roles were found[PacerMonitor](https://www.pacermonitor.com/public/filings/DOKFEMQA/Earth_Fare_Inc__debke-20-10256__0022.1.pdf).
neighbors.influence_justification: Private resident; no civic role found

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage directly at residence to hear concerns and share information, building trust through personal outreach.

neighbors.name: Brian Vaughn Santos Tuncap Jr and Nicole Marie Rodriguez
neighbors.claims: Brian V. S. Tuncap Jr. and Nicole M. Rodriguez are identified as owners of parcel 400-35-399 (9106 S 253rd Ave) in Buckeye, AZ[Redfin](https://www.redfin.com/AZ/Buckeye/9106-S-253rd-Ave-85326/home/28419077). Tuncap Jr. is the registered owner of 'Big Dawg Trucking LLC', which utilizes the residential property as its business address[Broker Snapshot](https://brokersnapshot.com/Company?dot=4007247&prefix=MC&docket=1507758). In 2021, Tuncap Jr. was listed in City of Buckeye council minutes for receiving a library impact fee refund related to a residential building permit[City of Buckeye Minutes](https://d3n9y02raazwpg.cloudfront.net/buckeyeaz/862464d2-ae9c-11eb-8549-0050569183fa-40612d32-0819-4118-bb57-c01bc175e005-1625510867.pdf).
neighbors.influence_justification: Small business owner; interaction with city council

approach_recommendations.engage: Reach out in person; acknowledge local business ownership (trucking). Address road safety and traffic concerns relevant to his fleet operations.
